messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

for testing for project tuesday testing hi having os safari also monitor keyboard mouse pm approve needed please assign note located best regards test consultant mob zone

message.reasoning:

My aim is to accurately assign it to "Hardware," "HR Support," "Access," "Miscellaneous," "Storage," "Purchase," "Internal Project," or "Administrative rights."

I'm currently refining my categorization of the IT ticket.
